article_metadata.description: I receive a fair number of videos, emails and articles about the coming financial crash. It is always nigh. It is always imminent. And it is always being predicted by the elite people who predicted the last three big events correctly. The cause is deficit spending, the growing debt, entitlement spending, [...]
